attributes.action: Free Dental Treatment for War Veterans
attributes.additional_details:
All returned service men and women, especially second world war veterans, should receive exemption from NHS dental and optical charges.
If asylum seekers who receive income support or JSA can be entitled to free dental treatment, then why not those men and women, who risked their lives to ensure that the country they seek asylum in, is free and safe and in a position to accept their asylum.
